mapper.insert: insert into BOOKWRITER.T_PRESCRIPTION_DETAIL (PRESCRIPTION_NO, SEQ_NO, DRUG_CODE, QUANTITY) values (#{prescriptionNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{seqNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{drugCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.select: select PRESCRIPTION_NO, SEQ_NO, DRUG_CODE, QUANTITY from BOOKWRITER.T_PRESCRIPTION_DETAIL
